articles.description: Lenovo has introduced the Yoga Book 9i, a new dual-screen laptop, in India. The Lenovo Yoga Book 9i has quad speakers with Dolby Atmos technology and runs on Intels Evo ...
articles.content: Lenovo has introduced the Yoga Book 9i, a new dual-screen laptop, in India. The Lenovo Yoga Book 9i has quad speakers with Dolby Atmos technology and runs on Intel's Evo architecture. Let's take a lo… [+833 chars]
